name: PizzaFast Delivery: The Game (Extended Demo)
description:
Calling all pizza delivery folk! Delve into the deep space of a moderately distant future in PizzaFast Delivery: The Game (Extended Demo) ((Premium Deluxe Free Edition))! You take control of Sue-V, a sentient oven who is shunted into the hectic conflict between PizzaFast Delivery and Alfredo’s Frozen Pizza! In this demo, you have the chance to explore a future version of Earth and fight your way to collect mysterious black boxes scattered around the planet.

 

Features:

-Fully animated sideview battles

-A strategic spin on traditional RPG combat

-Over an hour’s worth of gameplay

-A mildly humorous tone

-Throw pizza

-Deliver pizza

-Kill pizza

And more!

 

I hope that this demo ends up becoming moderately popular! I don’t know whether a game like this would warner continuing serious development, so I’m putting this out there to see where it ends up! Thank you thank you THANK YOU so much for playing and supporting me!

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Z: Interact/OK/Select
  • X: Cancel
  • C: Menu

Join the Discord! https://discord.gg/EYXtdGG
